summary: The build request (REQ-93) explicitly requires a rebuild/redeploy with ZERO source code changes to any file. However, the diff shows that at least two frontend source files were modified: BirdDataTable.tsx and BirdGallery.tsx. Additionally, frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json were modified. The constraint 'Do not modify any source file — backend or frontend' and the acceptance criterion 'No source file is modified during this deployment' are directly violated.

missing_requirements.requirement: No source file is modified during this deployment — this is a rebuild/redeploy only with zero code changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows modifications to frontend/src/components/BirdDataTable.tsx and frontend/src/components/BirdGallery.tsx, which are source files. The build request explicitly states no source files should be modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of BirdDataTable.tsx source file — switching from manual useState/useEffect admin detection to useIsCallerAdmin React Query hook
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly prohibits any source code modifications. The diff description in frontend-file-summaries.txt confirms BirdDataTable.tsx was changed to use the useIsCallerAdmin React Query hook directly instead of the manual useState/useEffect pattern. This is a code change not requested.

hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly prohibits any source code modifications. The diff description in frontend-file-summaries.txt confirms BirdGallery.tsx was changed to use the useIsCallerAdmin React Query hook directly instead of the manual useState/useEffect pattern.
